summary: Two Spanish pan-handlers soon find themselves in over their heads when they stumble upon an opportunity to redeem themselves and perhaps the entire planet. The world appears to suffer from ... See full summary »
cast: Jordi Mollà|Candela Peña|Juan Carlos Vellido|Daniel Giménez Cacho|Franco di Francescantonio|Florinda Chico|Álex Angulo|Enrique Villén|José María Sagone|Germán Montaner|Valentina Alonso|Manuel Puchades|Silvia Casanova|Fernando Albizu|Eduardo Antuña|Isabel Ayúcar|Lola Peno|Silvia de Esteban|Silvia Bermejo|Manuel Brun|Arturo Amez|Rocío Calvo|Roger Álvarez|Sonsoles Benedicto|Celia Bermejo|Pablo Calvo|Sandra Dominique|Ana García Cerdeiriña|Paul Gibert|Raúl Jiménez|Juan Carlos Martínez Antuña|José Moreno|Adrián Portugal
title: No somos nadie
